description: Salford and Crewe share a draw in what turned out to be a pulsating finish.
title: Salford City 1-1 Crewe Alexandra
title_page: Salford City 1-1 Crewe Alexandra - BBC Sport
maintext:
Salford City have won each of their three home league games against Crewe Alexandra, scoring 3+ goals in each of those victories.
Crewe Alexandra have won just two of their seven league games against Salford City (D1 L4), though both wins saw the Raileymen net exactly four goals.
Salford City have won just one of their last 10 league games (D4 L5), having won six in a row before this.
Crewe have lost just two of their last 14 away league games (W4 D8), though will be looking to claim successive wins on the road for just the second time this season after beating Chesterfield 3-1 in their last away outing.
